attributes.action: Ban the practice of Halal Slaughter in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This method of killing is in-humane, tantamount to murder.
The British people abhore it, and it is only for a minority, a minority that need to learn to live within our laws and respect our customs.
Videos show the animal under total pain and distress when this method is carried out. IT MUST BE BANNED.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
